definition: the prehistoric Shang dynasty (c. 16th-11th century BC)
commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)
Shang Dynasty (c. 1600-1046 BC)/surname Shang
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon

sentences.english: Chopsticks originated in ancient China and dates back to as early as the Shang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 筷子的历史起源于中国古代，最早可以追溯到商代。

sentences.english: So the territory of Shang should include these states into it.
sentences.chinese: 商代国家疆域应包括这些诸侯国在内。

sentences.english: Early Shang Dynasty thought was based upon cyclicity.
sentences.chinese: 商代早期的思想是根据旋回。

sentences.english: There were so many musical instruments of Shang dynasty unearthed and most of which had decorative patterns of gulosity on their surfaces.
sentences.chinese: 商代出土乐器众多，其纹饰则以饕餮纹样为主导。

sentences.english: China's water transport has a long history. Early in the Shang Dynasty (1600 -1046 BC) there were sailing boats.
sentences.chinese: 中国水运的发展历史十分悠久，远在商代就有了帆船。

sentences.english: The symbols inscribed on pottery earlier than the Shang Dynasty bear resemblance to the Shang oracles.
sentences.chinese: 夏商以前的陶纹刻符与商代的甲骨文有相似之处。

sentences.english: Aim It is concluded that a new type quotient algebra of R0 algebra.
sentences.chinese: 目的在R0代数中构造一种新型商代数。

sentences.english: Bu must have a connection with the military system of Shang dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 卜辞之“步”应与商代军制单位有关。

sentences.english: During the Shang, fate could be manipulated by great deities , commonly translated as Gods.
sentences.chinese: 在商代，命运可能是伟大的神所操纵，通常翻译成神。

sentences.english: The second part, the analyse of the bronze sacrifice vessels of the central plains area in the Middle—Shang Period.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分，中原地区商代中期青铜礼器的分析。

sentences.english: Since the Shang Dynasty began, this piece of land there are human beings flourish.
sentences.chinese: 自商代开始，这片土地上就有人类繁衍生息。

sentences.english: There were fairly perfect supplies of water and drainages in the cities of Shang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 商代城邑已具有较完备的给排水设施。

sentences.english: There are quite many sacrifice remains of Shang dynasty in both Zhengzhou Shang city and Yanshi Shang city.
sentences.chinese: 郑州商城和偃师商城都存在着较多的商代祭祀遗存。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, white pottery-making techniques also developed to a high level in the late Shang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 同时，白陶的制作工艺也在商代晚期得到了高度发展。

sentences.english: The Yin ruins of An Yang city has long been considered to be the capital of Shang Dynasty since Pan Geng's rein.
sentences.chinese: 安阳殷墟一直被视为盘庚以来商代殷都的所在地。

definition: Western Zhou (1027-771 BC)
Zhou dynasty (1046-221 BC)
Shang Dynasty (c. 1600-1046 BC)
Xia or Hsia dynasty c. 2000 BC
the Bronze Age/also written 青銅時代|青铜时代[Qing1 tong2 Shi2 dai4]
Neolithic Era
to dig up/to appear in an excavation/unearthed/to come up out of the ground
Yangshao neolithic culture from the central Yellow river basin, with red and black pottery
Dawenkou culture (c. 4100-2600 BC), Neolithic culture based in today's Shandong area 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]
final name of the Shang dynasty after their move to Yinxu 殷墟 in modern Henan province
Xia Dynasty (2070-1600 BC)
Longshan culture/black pottery culture
bronze implement/refers to ancient bronze artifacts, from c. 2,000 BC
Eastern Zhou (770-221 BC)
Yinxu, ruins of Yinshang 殷商 city at Anyang 安陽|安阳 in Henan province, a World Heritage site
Xia, Shang and Zhou, the earliest named Chinese dynasties
